title: Community and Support
description: Discover all the different ways of reaching us, how you can contribute to our project and get the latest updates.

sections.heading: Stay Informed
sections.paragraph: All new announcements, code and hardware updates are posted on our Discord server. New releases are obviously also released on our GitHub. For smaller anouncements, updates and milestones check out our Instagram.

sections.heading: Join the Conversation
sections.paragraph: Our main platform for conversation, feedback etc. is our Discord server. If you have interesting ideas, feedback, questions or just want to talk about rockets and flight electronics join our server!

sections.heading: Contributing
sections.paragraph: Do you want to contribute to our project? Hit us up on info@catsystems.io and let us know your ideas! We would be proud to have more people implementing new features in our project or telling us about bugs and improvements!
